author: andschwa
body:
These non-CI tests are failing on Linux (perhaps also on OS X and Windows, as yet untested):

```
Describing Compare-Object DRT basic functionality                                                                 [1963/28901]
Add-Type : (1) : The type or namespace name 'Employee' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly re
ference?)
(1) : >>>     public class EmployeeComparable : Employee, System.IComparable
(2) :     {
At /home/andrew/src/PowerShell/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Compare-Object.Tests.ps1:179 char:4
+             Add-Type -TypeDefinition @"
+             ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidData: (Microsoft.Power...peCompilerError:AddTypeCompilerError) [Add-Type], Exception
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : SOURCE_CODE_ERROR,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.AddTypeCommand

Add-Type : (5) : 'Employee' does not contain a constructor that takes 3 arguments
(4) :             string firstName, string lastName, int yearsInMS)
(5) : >>>             : base(firstName, lastName, yearsInMS)
(6) :         {}
At /home/andrew/src/PowerShell/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Compare-Object.Tests.ps1:179 char:4
+             Add-Type -TypeDefinition @"
+             ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidData: (Microsoft.Power...peCompilerError:AddTypeCompilerError) [Add-Type], Exception
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : SOURCE_CODE_ERROR,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.AddTypeCommand

Add-Type : (13) : 'EmployeeComparable' does not contain a definition for 'FirstName' and no extension method 'FirstName' accep
ting a first argument of type 'EmployeeComparable' could be
found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?)
(12) :                 return -1;
(13) : >>>             if (FirstName != ec.FirstName)
(14) :                 return -1;
At /home/andrew/src/PowerShell/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Compare-Object.Tests.ps1:179 char:4
+             Add-Type -TypeDefinition @"
+             ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidData: (Microsoft.Power...peCompilerError:AddTypeCompilerError) [Add-Type], Exception
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : SOURCE_CODE_ERROR,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.AddTypeCommand
... (and more!)
```

/cc @JamesWTruher @vors

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: This was also failing; resolved via #1699.

title: Compare-Object test failures
